semantic_description: Ensure RabbitMQ client operations are fully instrumented and enriched with standard OpenTelemetry messaging attributes so that their spans appear in Jaeger traces with complete metadata.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue name passed to BasicPublish or BasicConsume

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the routing key argument in BasicPublish
